name: Chatime Pearl Milk Tea
description: Tapioca pearls add a pleasant texture to our signature milk tea, a best-selling fan favourite. Have this drink made in your choice of Signature Milk Tea, Fresh Milk or Oat Milk.

name: Chatime Roasted Milk Tea
description: One of our most popular milk teas, Japanese Roasted Tea! Have this drink made in your choice of Signature Milk Tea, Fresh Milk or Oat Milk.

name: Chatime Signature Milk Tea
description: Our world famous milk tea, brewed from premium loose leaf black tea. Delicious and classic. For the tea lovers! Select any of our tea bases and have it made in your choice of Signature Milk Tea, Fresh Milk or Oat Milk

name: Chatime Triple
description: Our popular roasted milk tea paired with our top three toppings: pearls, grass jelly, and pudding to create a decadent and flavourful combination. Perfect for when you want it all! Have this drink made in your choice of Signature Milk Tea, Fresh Milk or Oat Milk.

name: Earl Grey Milk Tea
description: One of the most recognized flavoured teas in the world: bold and rich with a subtle hint of citrus and bergamot. Have this drink made in your choice of Signature Milk Tea, Fresh Milk or Oat Milk.

name: Genmaicha Milk Tea
description: Rich and smooth with a subtle aroma of roasted rice. Have this drink made in your choice of Signature Milk Tea, Fresh Milk or Oat Milk.

name: Golden Lily Milk Tea
description: Our Golden Lily is an Alishan JinShyuan Tea that has a naturally creamy texture with an added hint of floral notes. Have this drink made in your choice of Signature Milk Tea, Fresh Milk or Oat Milk.

name: Grass Jelly Roasted Milk Tea
description: Our most popular drink! Grass jelly adds a satisfying texture to our delicious classic roasted milk tea. Have this drink made in your choice of Signature Milk Tea, Fresh Milk or Oat Milk.

name: Iron Goddess Milk Tea
description: An Oolong-style tea, called Tieguanyin, that features a deep, robust flavour. Have this drink made in your choice of Signature Milk Tea, Fresh Milk or Oat Milk.

name: Jasmine Jade Green Milk Tea
description: A fragrant and delicate brew, paired with the rich creaminess of milk tea. Have this drink made in your choice of Signature Milk Tea, Fresh Milk or Oat Milk.

name: Chocolate Malt Milk Tea
description: A sweet chocolate milk tea drink with subtle hints of malt

name: Hazelnut Milk Tea
description: Sweet and creamy, with a hint of nuttiness, this milk tea is packed with flavour

name: Honeydew Milk Tea
description: Like biting into a fresh honeydew melon, this drink offers bold and refreshing fruity flavours

name: Salted Caramel Milk Tea
description: Our salted caramel milk tea is salty, sweet, and irresistibly buttery.

name: Grapefruit Tea
description: Our jasmine green tea with bold and tangy citrus grapefruit flavours

name: Lychee Tea
description: Full-bodied black tea flavour with a touch of tropical fruitiness

name: Mango Grapefuit Tea
description: A swirl of tropical mango mixed with tangy grapefruit

name: Mango Tea
description: The tropical flavour of juicy mango, combined with earthy green tea

name: Passion Fruit Tea
description: A little sweet, a little tart – our passion fruit green tea is made with REAL passion fruit seeds which means it’s loaded with delicious, refreshing flavour!

name: Peach Tea
description: The soft and subtle sweetness of refreshing and fruity peach

name: Peachy Lychee Tea
description: Sweet peach flavour mixed with tropical lychee

name: Strawberry Passion Tea
description: The perfect mix of sweet strawberry with tart passion fruit!

name: Strawberry Tea
description: A floral green tea with a fruit strawberry flavour!

name: Candied Winter Melon Iced tea
description: The perfect mix of sweet caramel notes as an iced tea

name: Candied Winter Melon Latte
description: The perfect mix of caramel-notes and creamy made with your choice of milk

name: Chocolate Hazelnut Delight
description: Rich chocolate milk tea with toasted notes of roasted hazelnuts.

name: Handcrafted Taro
description: Real ground taro for a robust taste with a granular texture in this milk tea

name: Thai Milk Tea
description: Strongly brewed black tea with spices, finished with condensed milk and evaporated milk

name: QQ Grapefruit
description: Our grapefruit juice has a tart citrus kick with a hint of sweetness. Topped with QQ, our topping that includes both our pearls and coconut jelly!

name: QQ Lychee
description: Refreshing tropical fruitiness of lychee topped with QQ, our topping that includes both our pearls and coconut jelly!

name: QQ Mango
description: A tropical paradise of sweet and fruity mango. Topped with QQ, our topping that includes both our pearls and coconut jelly!

name: QQ Passion Fruit
description: A perfect combo of sweet, fruity, and tart with the addition of our real passion fruit seeds! Topped with QQ, our topping that includes both our pearls and coconut jelly!

name: QQ Peach
description: Refreshingly fruity taste of peach. Topped with QQ, our topping that includes both our pearls and coconut jelly!

name: QQ Strawberry
description: Our strawberry juice is made with real strawberry puree and topped with QQ, a topping that includes both our pearls and coconut jelly!

name: Matcha Latte
description: Earthy robust matcha tea mixed with your choice of milk for an added touch of richness

name: Matcha Strawberry Latte
description: Earthy robust matcha tea mixed with your choice of milk for an added touch of richness

name: Matcha Smoothie
description: The earthy taste of matcha green tea is blended into a frosty drink

name: Matcha Roasted Milk Tea
description: Perfect for tea lovers - our robust matcha tea layered with Chatime's famous Roasted Milk Tea

name: Matcha Milk Tea
description: Our matcha tea created as a milk tea!

name: Brown Sugar Pearls with Fresh Milk
description: Fresh milk with the added richness of caramelized brown sugar pearls and topped with sea salt crema

name: Brown Sugar Pearls with Milk Tea
description: Our signature milk tea with the added richness of caramelized brown sugar pearls and topped with sea salt crema

name: Brown Sugar Pearls with Oat Milk
description: Oat milk with the added richness of caramelized brown sugar pearls and topped with sea salt crema

name: Peach Slush
description: Thick, frosty, and peachy sweet

name: Honeydew Slush
description: An icy blend of bold fruity, honeydew flavour!

name: Lychee Slush
description: A hint of lychee with frosty tropical sweetness

name: Mango Smoothie
description: A frosty milky smoothie with big tropical mango flavour

name: Milk Tea Smoothie
description: Our signature best-selling milk tea blended into a creamy smoothie

name: Strawberry Smoothie
description: Just the perfect amount of tartness and sweetness with the added touch of delicious fruity strawberry!

name: Passion Fruit Slush
description: A frosty combination of sweet and tart flavours, the perfectly balanced slush dotted with real passion fruit seeds!

name: Taro Smoothie
description: Frosty and creamy smoothie with robust real ground taro flavour
